pwaBlock.title: PWA only, no native apps
pwaBlock.body: No App Store: your business gets a white-label PWA installable on iOS and Android. Same experience everywhere, one codebase, instant updates.

forWho.foodDesc: Pizzeria, street food, venues with orders and pickup. Clear orders, kitchen and staff aligned.
forWho.gymDesc: For specific needs (gym, multi-location, complex logic) we evaluate on request.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Guided configuration and direct support until go-live.
howItWorks.setupDesc: Design, configuration, branding, testing and launch. Spread over 6–12 months if needed.
howItWorks.configDesc: Services, staff, hours and settings tailored to your business.
howItWorks.goliveDesc: Final check and launch. Every project starts after a discovery call.

reliability.title: Reliability by design
reliability.subtitle: No magic claims: only verifiable behaviours already in production.
reliability.b1desc: Orders and bookings with idempotent key to avoid duplicates on retry.
reliability.b2desc: Cron jobs with per-shop lock to avoid concurrent runs.
reliability.b3desc: Test mode: no real data, push suppressed, isolated and cleanable data.
reliability.b4desc: Handling expired or invalid subscriptions without cascade errors.
reliability.b5desc: Deploy per shop with isolated branding, no data leakage between tenants.
reliability.b6desc: Pre-release checklist and runbooks for repeatable checks.

pricingTeaser.title: Two plans: Essential and Advanced
pricingTeaser.subtitle: Prices differ for barber/hairdresser and for food. Setup can be spread over 6 or 12 months.

faqItems.a1: Depends on complexity. Every project starts after a discovery call to define timeline and scope.
faqItems.a2: Yes, we support importing customers, services and booking history. Contact us to evaluate migration.
faqItems.a3: The client app runs as an installable PWA and supports offline use for viewing bookings and profile.
faqItems.a4: Payment integrations depend on the vertical and agreements; we evaluate them on request.
faqItems.q5: Is there a limit on the number of bookings?
faqItems.a5: No. Plans differ by type of business (Essential vs Advanced) and vertical.
faqItems.a6: Email support for all plans. With Advanced you get priority and dedicated support at launch.
faqItems.a7: Yes, all plans include branded PWA: colours, logo and app icon.
faqItems.a8: We use encryption, daily automated backups and GDPR compliance. Data is hosted on EU infrastructure.
faqItems.q9: What if I want to change plan?
faqItems.a9: Yes. Moving to a different plan applies from the next billing cycle.
faqItems.a10: Every project starts after a discovery call. No public demo: we discuss your business and propose the right solution.
